twcore.core.events
Class Message

java.lang.Object
  twcore.core.events.SubspaceEvent
      twcore.core.events.Message

public class Message
extends SubspaceEvent

(S2C 0x07) Event fired when a chat message is received. 

 +------------------------------+
 | Offset  Length  Description  |
 +------------------------------+
 | 0       1       Type Byte    |
 | 1       1       Chat Type    |
 | 2       1       Sound Byte   |
 | 3       2       Sender ID    |
 | 5       *       Chat Message |
 +------------------------------+
Chat message is null-terminated ('\0')
